post.text: Hillary spoke on the final night of the Democratic National Convention and officially accepted the presidential nominationâ€”becoming the first woman ever nominated by a major party. Then, everyone celebrated.

comment.author: Matthew
comment.text: The convention was great and I am for Hillary in the fall

replies.author: Danielle
replies.text: "Fall" wise choice of words....the time is at hand... watch, wait and see.

replies.author: Brianna
replies.text: Daily Caller investigations have revealed that the Podesta Group has represented Uranium One, a Russia-controlled uranium company that had ties to Canadian mining magnate and Clinton Foundation philanthropist Frank Giustra.
